extract.para: Records active sessions. There should be a background task to delete expired sessions and keep this table vacuumed. Note that for performance reasons we may want to disable any foreign key constraints on this table.

Column context_type_id: This, along with the context_id column describes the context used for authentication of this session. This allows users to log in in specific contexts (eg for dept a, rather than dept b), within which role mappings may differ. This context information allows the session to determine which role mappings to apply.
Column context_id: See comment on veil2.sessions.context_type_id
